content.prompt: In order to strengthen her argument, the author references which of the following contemporary circumstances?

choices.label: Legislation that has recently been passed by Congress
The backlog of cases for immigration hearings
An unfulfilled pledge by a political leader
Widespread abuses in the criminal justice system

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
